columns.name: storage_account_id
columns.description: The resource ID of the storage account to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.

columns.name: service_bus_rule_id
columns.description: The service bus rule Id of the diagnostic setting.

columns.name: event_hub_authorization_rule_id
columns.description: The resource Id for the event hub authorization rule.

columns.name: event_hub_name
columns.description: The name of the event hub.

columns.name: workspace_id
columns.description: The full ARM resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.

columns.name: log_analytics_destination_type
columns.description: A string indicating whether the export to Log Analytics should use the default destinatio type.
